sourcesContent:
<iframe width="560" height="315" *ngIf="this.selectedMovie[0]" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{selectedMovie[0].link}}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=0&rel=0&html5=1&showinfo=0&controls=0" frameborder="0" 
    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; " allowfullscreen></iframe>
